scripts.build: algokit compile ts smart_contracts --puya-path=puya --output-source-map --out-dir artifacts && algokit generate client smart_contracts/artifacts --output {app_spec_dir}/{contract_name}Client.ts
scripts.build-app-registry: algokit compile ts smart_contracts/app-registry --puya-path=puya --output-source-map --out-dir ../artifacts/app-registry && algokit generate client smart_contracts/artifacts/app-registry --output {app_spec_dir}/{contract_name}Client.ts
scripts.build-arc58-all: algokit compile ts smart_contracts/arc58 --puya-path=puya --output-source-map --out-dir artifacts && algokit generate client smart_contracts/artifacts/arc58 --output {app_spec_dir}/{contract_name}Client.ts
scripts.build-arc58-account: algokit compile ts smart_contracts/arc58/account --puya-path=puya --output-source-map --out-dir ../../artifacts/arc58/account --log-level debug && algokit generate client smart_contracts/artifacts/arc58/account --output {app_spec_dir}/{contract_name}Client.ts
